name: TRYPTOPHAN
cautions:
Cautions eosinophilia-myalgia syndrome has been
reported (withhold treatment if increased eosinophil
count, myalgia, arthralgia, fever, dyspnoea, neuropathy, oedema or
skin lesions develop until possibility of eosinophilia-myalgia syndrome
excluded); interactions: Appendix 1 (tryptophan)
side-effects:
Side-effects drowsiness, nausea, headache, light-headedness,
suicidal behaviour (see Suicidal Behaviour and Antidepressant
Therapy);
eosinophilia-myalgia syndrome, see Cautions
doses: 1 g 3 times daily; max. 6 g daily; elderly lower dose may be appropriate especially in renal or hepatic impairment; child not recommended
